target.name: main
target.echo: **************** WARNING (SLING-443/SLING-1782) ****************************** On most platforms, you'll get OutOfMemoryErrors when building unless you set on 32bit platforms: MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx256M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M", see SLING-443 on 64bit platforms: MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx512M -XX:MaxPermSize=512M", see SLING-1782 ******************************************************************************
